title: metadata
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <metadata> tag provides metadata about the HTML document.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Setting the character set of the document to UTF-8.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Adding a description to the document.
usageExamples.code: <metadata name="description" content="This is a sample description.">
